title: Far Reach Survey Vessel
wikitext:
[[File:FarReachSurveyVessel.jpg|400px|thumb|right]] '''Far Reach Survey Vessel'''
'''Craft''': Loronar Far Reach IV PQR
'''Affiliation''': Empire
'''Era''': Rise of the Empire
'''Source''': The Isis Coordinates (page 21)
'''Type''': Imperial survey vessel
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 80 meters
'''Skill''': Space transports: Far Reach
'''Crew''': 2, '''gunners''': 4
'''Crew Skill''': Astrogation 4D+1, space transports: Imperial Survey Vessel 6D, starship gunnery 4D, starship shields 4D, sensors 5D
'''Passengers''': None
'''Cargo Capacity''': 150 metric tons
'''Consumables''': 6 months
'''Cost''': Not available for sale
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x4
'''Nav Computer''': Yes
'''Maneuverability''': 2D
'''Space''': 6
'''Atmosphere''': 330; 950 kmh
'''Hull''': 3D
'''Shields''': 1D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 40/1D *Scan: 80/2D *Search: 120/4D *Focus: 4/4D+2 '''Weapons:''' *4 Laser Cannons (fire separately) : Fire Arc: Turret
Crew: 1
Skill: Starship gunnery
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere: 100-300/1.2/2.5 km
Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': The artwork for the deckplan of this ship was recycled from an older West End Games source. Originally this artwork was used on the 54 meter Imperial cargo shuttle also known as the Curich-class shuttle. This artwork originally appeared in the Star Wars Campaign Pack published in 1988 and reprinted in 1994 in Classic Campaigns. The older artwork's stats were re-sized to 80 meters in length and new exterior artwork was produced to differentiate it from the older smaller ship for the 1990 publication.
